#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements,Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation,wmr
=Logrotate weather data file - WMR logger for Oregon Scientific USB protocol=
------------
For logrotate data LOG/SQL/RRD file, copy contrib/wmr_logrotate.sh
to /usr/bin/wmr_logrotate.sh, or edit config file path to logrotae
script:
{{{
	wmr_logrotate.sh (default: /usr/bin/wmr_logrotate.sh).
}}}
Run - type: /usr/bin/wmr_logrotate.sh -logrotate
or, insert cron job new line:
------------
 for every day:
{{{                  
   0 0 * * * * /usr/bin/wmr_logrotate.sh -logrotate
}}}

 for every month:
{{{                  
   0 0 1 * * * /usr/bin/wmr_logrotate.sh -logrotate
}}}

 for every year:
{{{                  
   0 0 1 1 * * /usr/bin/wmr_logrotate.sh -logrotate
}}}
